SalesOrderBilling.description: The SalesOrderBilling object cannot be null and cannot be an empty object.

PaymentType.description:
Maps to the field CreditCardTypes.CreditCardTypeId in your WinMan database. If the customer wishes to pay on account, set this field to 'On Account'.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

CardPaymentReceived.description:
The total payment amount received for this order. If the customer wishes to pay on account, this field can be set to 0, null, or it can be omitted.
Null values: allowed
Zero values: allowed
